org.ssa4j
Class ScrapeScriptDeployer

java.lang.Object
  org.ssa4j.ScrapeScriptDeployer
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnterpriseScrapeScriptDeployer, ProfessionalScrapeScriptDeployer
public abstract class ScrapeScriptDeployer
extends java.lang.Object

General abstract class that subclasses implement to provide an ability to deploy *.sss files to a running screen-scraper instance.

Author:
Rodney Aiglstorfer

deploy

public void deploy(java.lang.String resource)
            throws java.io.IOException
Supports a single *.sss file or a ZIP file that contains *.sss files stored as a class resource (e.g. packaged with the JAR).

Parameters:
resource - The resource path to a single *.sss file or a ZIP file containing multiple *.sss files
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown if there are any issues reading the resource
